ruling: - [[Cyber Dinosaur]]'s effect is a Quick Effect.

- If your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand while [[Stumbling]] is active, you can chain [[Cyber Dinosaur]]'s effect to the effect of [[Stumbling]]. [[Stumbling]]'s effect will be Chain Link 1 and [[Cyber Dinosaur]]'s effect will be Chain Link 2.

- If your opponent Special Summons a Machine-Type monster from their hand while [[Cyber Summon Blaster]] is active, you can chain [[Cyber Dinosaur]]'s effect to the effect of [[Cyber Summon Blaster]]. [[Cyber Summon Blaster]]'s effect will be Chain Link 1 and [[Cyber Dinosaur]]'s effect will be Chain Link 2.
- If you have 2 [[Cyber Dinosaur]]s in your hand when your opponent Special Summons a monster from their hand, you can only activate the effect of 1 of the [[Cyber Dinosaur]]s.
